definition: to evoke/to induce/to call to mind/to pick up with a hook
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Accumulations, rous 'd love and joy and thought.
sentences.chinese: 那些积聚，被勾起的爱和欢乐，以及思索。

sentences.english: Please don't play that song, It has bad associations for me .
sentences.chinese: 请别放那首歌，那会勾起我的伤心往事。

sentences.english: With their breath comes the memory of my old day songs.
sentences.chinese: 花气芬芳勾起我对往日歌曲的记忆。

sentences.english: The continuous rain , recmy missing for you.
sentences.chinese: 绵亘不断的细雨，勾起我对你的挂念。

sentences.english: Perhaps the only thing that`s recognizable is his signature hairstyle.
sentences.chinese: 或许唯一能勾起回忆的就是他那标志性的发型。

sentences.english: His new intelligence also causes memories of his childhood to surface.
sentences.chinese: 新增的智力也勾起了他对童年的记忆。

sentences.english: Sip tea, the subtle fragrance, best evoke the warm memories.
sentences.chinese: 抿一口茶，那淡淡的香味，最能勾起有关温馨的回忆。

sentences.english: Willingness of the window in the evening for me to read a poem?
sentences.chinese: 难道是傍晚窗边的情景勾起了我读诗的愿望？

sentences.english: There are risks to whetting America's appetite.
sentences.chinese: 勾起美国人食欲也有风险。

sentences.english: The scene reminded me of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 此情景勾起了我对童年的回忆。

sentences.english: A trip to his home town triggered his childhood memory.
sentences.chinese: 返乡之旅勾起了他的童年回忆。

sentences.english: A tune of "Long Missing" arouses my sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 一曲《长相思》勾起了伤心。

sentences.english: The letter from her mother set off an attack of homesickness.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈的来信勾起了她的一阵思乡之情。

sentences.english: A song might come on the radio that reminds you of them.
sentences.chinese: 一首收音机里传来的歌也许会勾起你对往日的回忆。

sentences.english: Everything around him was full of her presence, continually reopening the wound.
sentences.chinese: 他身边的一切都是母亲的影子不断勾起他的伤感。
勾起我对很久以前的记忆。

definition: to waken (to action)/to rouse (the masses)/to evoke (attention, recollection etc)
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to arouse/to evoke/to cause/to stir up
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
reverie/daydream/to be lost in wild and fanciful thoughts
